revised_title: Constraints and Trade-offs in the Evolution of Life Histories
tldr: This article discusses the constraints and trade-offs that influence the evolution of life histories in organisms. It explores the concept of functional constraints, which limit the combinations of age-specific fertility and survival that can be achieved due to physiological or ecological factors. The article also highlights the importance of understanding trade-off functions in the environment and the use of genetic studies and experimental manipulations to detect these trade-offs.
